## Streams as Data Sources




## Get Stock prices

```{r}
tickers = c("GIS", "K")

prices <- tq_get(tickers,
                 from = "2017-01-01",
                 to = params$date,
                 get = "stock.prices")
```

## Plot the stocks from that day

```{r}
prices %>%
  select(date, symbol, adjusted) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x=date,
      group=symbol,
      y=adjusted, color=symbol) +
  geom_line()
```
